A journey to Machine Learning

Machine Learning is enabling us to augment our problem-solving capabilities and achieve unprecedented productivity. Advanced ML techniques need large amounts of data to train machines and novel algorithms to efficiently implement the learning process. Here you will find current and past work related to my journey to machine learning.
